videoSnippet.title: Battle for the Future || Firouzja vs Carlsen || Lichess Titled Arena
videoSnippet.description:
Tournament page here https://lichess.org/tournament/mar20lta

Follow me on Instagram for extra content https://www.instagram.com/agadmator/

Alireza Firouzja vs Magnus Carlsen
March 2020 Lichess Titled Arena
Sicilian, Taimanov variation (B46)

1. e4 c5 2. Nf3 Nc6 3. Nc3 e6 4. d4 cxd4 5. Nxd4 a6 6. Be3 Nf6 7. a3 Qc7 8. f4 b5 9. e5 Nxd4 10. Bxd4 Ng8 11. Be2 Bb7 12. Bf3 Nh6 13. Ne4 Nf5 14. Bf2 h5 15. Qe2 Rc8 16. c3 d5 17. exd6 Nxd6 18. O-O Nxe4 19. Bxe4 Bxe4 20. Qxe4 Bd6 21. Bd4 O-O 22. Rae1 Rfe8 23. Kh1 Bc5 24. Bxc5 Qxc5 25. Qf3 g6 26. Re5 Qc4 27. Rfe1 Rcd8 28. Qg3 Rd3 29. Qg5 Red8 30. h3 Rd1 31. Kh2 Qd3 32. R1e3 Qd2 33. Rxe6 fxe6 34. Qxg6+ Kf8 35. Qf6+ Kg8 36. Rg3+

Materials used in research: 
Paul Morphy: Pride and Sorrow of Chess by David Lawson
The Genious Of Paul Morphy by Chris Ward

Check out agadmator's merch here https://teespring.com/stores/agadmators-swag-store

judgment.name: Blunder
judgment.comment: Checkmate is now unavoidable. Qf2 was best.
